word:
Never should either husband or wife indulge in a joke at the expense of the other's feelings. Never should either one in sport or in any other 
                                                                           96
way complain to others concerning their companion; for frequently indulgence in foolish and what may apparently be harmless joking will eventually become habit, and may end in trial and possibly in estrangement.--MS. 21, 1902. 

                                               -
